page.title: 18SOME EVENTS IN SETTLE 1985
page.content: {DECEMBER 1984}Christmas decorations put up in the town. A christmas tree in the market square and a small tree outside each shop or building. All the lights switched on by Mike Harding (singer/comedian living locally but performing throughout the country and on TV.) {JANUARY 1985}Local Drama group put on a performance of Snow White and The Seven Dwarfs. {MAY 1985}Local Brass Bands hold and enter competitions. {JULY 1985}Settle Junior School hold their sports day. Settle has its carnival. Giggleswick holds their horticultural and handicrafts show for local peole.
